verses.text: Rebuke me not, Lord, in your anger, punish me not in your wrath.
\+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, be gracious to me in my weakness. Heal me \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, for racked is my body;
all of me utterly racked. Why do you wait so long, \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*?
Turn, \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, rescue me; save me, because of your love.
For in death none can call you to mind; in Sheol who can praise you?
I am so weary of sighing. All the night I make my bed swim, and wet my couch with my tears.
My eyes swollen with grief; from weeping caused by my foes.
Begone, workers of wrong, for the Lordhas heard my loud weeping,
the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*has heard my entreaty, the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*accepts my prayer.
My foes will be stricken with terror, brought to shame and dismay in a moment.
